entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Clearing near noon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 21 January 2023
